name: Rancho Santa Margarita
shortDescription: A master-planned community offering scenic hills, family-friendly neighborhoods, and abundant parks.
fullDescription: Rancho Santa Margarita is a vibrant Orange County city known for its well-planned residential communities, picturesque landscapes, and excellent schools. With numerous parks, trails, and recreational facilities, it is ideal for families and outdoor enthusiasts. The city‚Äôs central location provides easy access to major freeways, shopping centers, and employment hubs, combining suburban comfort with urban convenience.

neighborhoods.name: Coto de Caza
neighborhoods.description: Exclusive gated community known for luxury homes and golf courses.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Luxury homes and golf course in Coto de Caza

neighborhoods.name: Trabuco Highlands
neighborhoods.description: Family-oriented neighborhood with parks, schools, and hiking trails.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Homes near hiking trails in Trabuco Highlands

neighborhoods.name: Rancho Cielo
neighborhoods.description: Popular residential area with shopping centers and community parks.

highlights.title: Paseo Park
highlights.description: Community park with playgrounds, picnic areas, and sports courts.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Playground and greenery at Paseo Park

highlights.title: Rancho Santa Margarita Lake
highlights.description: Popular spot for walking, fishing, and relaxing by the water.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Lake view with walking trail in Rancho Santa Margarita

highlights.title: Outdoor Trails
highlights.description: Extensive hiking and biking trails throughout the hills and canyons.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Hiking trail with hills in Rancho Santa Margarita

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: Year-round events including farmers markets, concerts, and holiday festivals.

faqs.question: What is Rancho Santa Margarita known for?
faqs.answer: It is known for its master-planned communities, scenic outdoor spaces, and family-friendly atmosphere.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Rancho Santa Margarita?
faqs.answer: The city is served by the Capistrano Unified School District, with several highly rated schools.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are available?
faqs.answer: Residents enjoy hiking, biking, fishing, and community park amenities.

faqs.question: How is the commute from Rancho Santa Margarita?
faqs.answer: The city offers easy access to the 241 and 261 toll roads, with commutes typically around 30-45 minutes to nearby job centers.
